channel.title: The Game Dads
channel.description: Two gamers who somehow woke up as employed dads in their 30's. How do dads find time to game? What changes when you have kids/wives/jobs?
channel.itunes:summary: Two gamers who somehow woke up as employed dads in their 30's.
channel.itunes:subtitle: How do dads find time to game? What changes when you have kids/wives/jobs?
channel.itunes:author: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks

item.title: Episode 1 - Neko Atsume
item.itunes:author: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks
item.dc:creator: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks
item.description: The first episode, full of air guitar intro music, caster introductions, toilet games, and rambling.
item.content:encoded: The first episode, full of air guitar intro music, caster introductions, toilet games, and rambling.
item.itunes:subtitle: How do dads find time to game? What changes when you have kids/wives/jobs?
item.itunes:summary: Two gamers who somehow woke up as employed dads in their 30's.
item.itunes:keywords: Game, Gamer, Gaming, Parenting, Nerd, Nerds

item.title: Episode 2 - That Dragon, Cancer
item.itunes:author: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks
item.dc:creator: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks
item.description: Episode 2 - in which Rusty explains That Dragon, Cancer... the game Patrick will not put himself through.
item.content:encoded: Episode 2 - in which Rusty explains That Dragon, Cancer... the game Patrick will not put himself through.
item.itunes:subtitle: How do dads find time to game? What changes when you have kids/wives/jobs?

item.title: Episode 3 - Freemium Garbage
item.itunes:author: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks
item.dc:creator: Patrick Rogers and Rusty Parks
item.description: Episode 3 - After a week of the apex of freemium torture, it's time to unload.
item.content:encoded: Episode 3 - After a week of the apex of freemium torture, it's time to unload.
item.itunes:subtitle: Freemium titles suck.
